## fastCos variable

Fast cosine approximation using [normCos](./math.normcos.md) (polynomial). Max. error \~0.00059693

In \[0 .. 2Ï€\] interval, approx. 18-20% faster than `Math.cos` on V8.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fastCos: (theta: number) => number
```
